description: AWS Organization is enabled.
AWS Management account exists.
IAM Users should not exist in Management Account.
EC2 Instances should not exist in Management Account.
Management Account should not have any VPCs.
CloudTrail should be enabled within the account.
CloudTrail should be enabled on the Organization.
At least one CloudTrail Organization Trail should be enabled.

check: Config Recorder in Management Account configured
description: Config Recorder in the Management Account should be enabled.

check: Config Delivery Channel in Management Account configured
description: Config Delivery Channel in Management Account should be enabled.
CloudFormation StackSets should be activated in the CloudFormation console.
GuardDuty Organization services should be enabled.
Resource Access Manager (RAM) trusted access should be enabled in the AWS Organization.
Security Hub trusted access should be enabled in the AWS Organization.

check: IAM Access Analyzer Organization service enabled
description: IAM Access Analyzer trusted access should be enabled in the AWS Organization.
AWS Config trusted access should be enabled in the AWS Organization.
CloudFormation trusted access should be enabled in the AWS Organization.
Top-level Infrastructure OU should exist.
Top-level Security OU should exist.
Top-level Workloads OU should exist.
IAM Identity Center trusted access should be enabled in the AWS Organization
IAM Identity Center should be configured.
Service Control Policy should be enabled within the AWS Organization.
Tag Policy should be enabled within the AWS Organization.
Backup Policy should be enabled within the AWS Organization.
Control Tower should be deployed.
Control Tower should be the latest version.
Control Tower should not be drifted.
Log Archive account should exist.
Audit/Security Tooling account should exist.
